Package com.example.oopproject.services

package com.example.oopproject.services
This package contains service layer classes responsible for implementing the business logic of the OOP project. Services handle operations related to entities like Exercise, User, Workout, FitnessGoal, and provide data manipulation methods.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.oopproject
    The main package of the Fitness Tracker API project.
